message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in this product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $1,000,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hi Alice, thanks for the opening offer.  That price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $600,000.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $600,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While I agree this is a good product, $900,000 is still a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $750,000?
